name: Snow war island
description:
A first person snow ball shooting game, where you just have 1000 snowball better make it against the ever increasing pill invasion.

This is my first game which i started out with a course on Udemy and later on added lots of functionality on my own, plus my own art.

Learned a lot doing this game and will update a final (Ammo functionality and some SFX) hope you have fun and please leave a comment
